text: "Love Walks In" is a 1986 song by Van Halen and is the third single from their seventh studio album 5150. It went to number 22 in the United States, number 65 in Canada and peaked at number 4 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock charts. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Van Halen songs Category:Synth rock songs
title: Love Walks In
